TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPersonalizable

summary.span: 定义用于应用程序和个性化状态的提取的附加管理功能。

span.span: Defines additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了使用之外`Personalizable`属性在控件的属性，控件还可以实现用于应用程序和提取的个性化设置状态的其他管理功能。In addition to using the `Personalizable` attribute on control properties, a control can also implement for additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state. 例如，需要管理的私有状态信息的控件应实现此接口。For example, controls that need to manage private state information should implement this interface. 复杂的机制，例如自定义缓存解决方案，数据暂留到大型机或 XML Web 服务，通过访问个性化的数据的控件还应实现此接口。Controls that access personalized data through complex mechanisms, such as custom cache solutions, data persistence to mainframes, or XML Web services, should also implement this interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不应添加基于在 App_Code 目录中定义的类的类型，则取决于默认二进制序列化机制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. 基于 App_Code 的项目不一致地二进制序列化，因为，它们可以有其在随机点的时间更改的程序集名称。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用接口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the interface. 此示例由一个.aspx 页面，引用名为的 Web 部件控件组成`UrlListWebPart`。The example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part control named `UrlListWebPart`. 以下代码是示例.aspx 文件。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是自定义源控件。The following code is the source for the custom control. 应将此文件放在 App_Code 目录中。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 键入名称来表示一个 URL，然后添加实际开头的 URL `http://`，然后单击**添加**按钮以添加此 URL。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean
public: property bool IsDirty { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件管理的自定义数据是否已经更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the custom data that a control manages has changed.

value.span: 如果用 接口管理的自定义数据已经更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the custom data managed with the interface has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件管理的数据已更改，当控件被视为"脏"。When data managed by a control has changed, the control is considered "dirty." 控制应返回`true`如果自定义数据的 it 管理通过接口已更改。A control should return `true` if the custom data that it manages through the interface has changed. 如果控件将返回`true`此属性，该控件的从在属性值提取过程中调用接口方法实现。If a control returns `true` from this property, the control's interface method implementation is called during property value extraction. > [!NOTE] > 此属性会自动检查个性化设置基础结构的处理 POST 请求的后一阶段。This property is checked automatically by the personalization infrastructure during the latter phases of processing a POST request. 但是，对于 GET 请求，返回的值从属性未选中状态。However, for GET requests, the value returned from the property is not checked. 一些其他事件必须已导致要被视为"脏"的任何控件状态-所管理的不只是数据的控件-若要保存。Some other event has to have caused the control to be considered "dirty" for any control state--not just data managed by --to be saved. 如果控件可以将自身标记为"脏"期间 GET 请求中，或者在某些非常特定的边界情况下的个性化设置基础结构中将控件视为"脏"期间 GET 请求中，然后将始终调用。If a control can mark itself as "dirty" during a GET request, or if the personalization infrastructure under some very specific boundary conditions considers a control "dirty" during a GET request, then will always be called. 控件可以引用其关联控件，并检查属性来确定当前作用域。A control can reference its associated control and check the property to determine the current scope. 控件的自定义数据的"更新"状态应适用于当前作用域。The "dirty" state of a control's custom data should be appropriate for the current scope. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 该示例的第一部分是承载网页控件。The first part of the example is the Web page that hosts a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第二部分是自定义代码控件调用`UrlListWebPart`。The second part of the example is the code for the custom control called `UrlListWebPart`. 应将此文件放在要运行该示例的 App_Code 目录中。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory to run the example. 请注意，源代码实现属性。Note that the source code implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 键入名称来表示一个 URL，然后添加实际开头的 URL `http://`，然后单击**添加**按钮以添加此 URL。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: 包含从基础数据存储区中加载的自定义范围确定数据的 。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 将自定义数据加载到控件中。

span.span: Loads custom data into a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件，使其可以自定义数据加载到本身上调用此方法。This method is called on a control to allow it to load custom data into itself. 它还可以返回一个值，指示是否必须重新编写控件的自定义状态到基础数据存储区，无论是否已更改的页上的任何其他个性化设置数据。It can also return a value that indicates whether a control's custom state must be written back to the underlying data store, regardless of whether any other personalization data on the page has changed. 控件可以设置自己的自定义属性并执行其他内部逻辑基于个性化设置字典中包含的值。A control can set its own custom properties and carry out additional internal logic based on the values contained in the personalization dictionary. 由 Web 部件控件集应用到控件的个性化设置数据时调用此方法。This method is called by the Web Parts control set while applying personalization data to a control. 您还应注意的合并行为-与作用域-作用域属性中包含对象。You should also be aware of the merge behavior of -scoped versus -scoped properties contained in the object. `state`参数包含从基础数据存储区加载的自定义数据的合并表示形式。The `state` parameter contains a merged representation of custom data that was loaded from the underlying data store. 在中作用域，请在页面本身时之前添加的所有值都范围应是可用。In scope, all the values that were previously added when the page itself was in scope would be available. 在作用域，如果与值相关联个性化设置范围中具有一个值时页中，添加了作用域和不同的值时在页面处于作用域，然后将个性化设置基础结构仅包括的作用域值 (而不是作用域值) 内`state`参数。In scope, if a value associated with personalization scope had one value added when the page was in scope, and a different value when the page was in scope, then the personalization infrastructure would only include the -scoped value (as opposed to the scope value) within the `state` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现中自定义方法控件。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the method in a custom control. 运行此示例中所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分中的类概述。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: 包含从基础数据存储区中加载的自定义范围确定数据的 。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 在控件的 对象中保存自定义属性和内部状态信息。

span.span: Saves custom properties and internal state information in the control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件可以存储其自己的自定义属性和内部状态信息中指定`state`参数。A server control can store its own custom properties and internal state information the specified in the `state` parameter. 信息存储为一系列的名称/值对。The information is stored as a series of name/value pairs. 要使用它可以在通过对控件所做的后续调用期间识别的名称/值对的控件负责方法。It is the responsibility of the control to use name/value pairs that it can recognize during subsequent calls made to the control through the method. 控件可以引用其关联控件，并检查对象，以确定当前作用域。A control can reference its associated control and check the object to determine the current scope. 自定义状态信息应适用于当前作用域。Custom state information should be appropriate for the current scope. 请注意，每个添加到值因为合并时的个性化设置基础结构依赖于此对象应与相应的范围值相关联和-作用域自定义数据在之前将其传递给方法。Note that each value that is added to the object should be associated with the appropriate scope value, because the personalization infrastructure depends on this when merging and -scoped custom data prior to passing it to the method. 控件时使用的 Web 部件的标准 ASP.NET 实现，必须确保放置在状态字典中的对象，可以序列化由 ASP.NET类。When using the standard ASP.NET implementation of Web Parts, controls must ensure that objects placed in the state dictionary can be serialized by the ASP.NET class. 在实践中，这意味着以下内容：In practice, this means the following: - 基元.NET Framework 类型、 字符串和如数组、 数组列表、 哈希表和混合字典集合面向.NET Framework 类型是自动的可序列化。Primitive .NET Framework types, strings, and collection-oriented .NET Framework types such as arrays, array lists, hash tables, and hybrid dictionaries, are automatically serializable. - 提供其自己的自定义类型类可以为序列化和反序列化从字符串被视为可序列化。Custom types that supply their own classes capable of serializing to and deserializing from strings are considered serializable. - 可以通过序列化的自定义类型类被视为可序列化。Custom types that can be serialized by the class are considered serializable. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不应添加基于在 App_Code 目录中定义的类的类型，则取决于默认二进制序列化机制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. 基于 App_Code 的项目不一致地二进制序列化，因为，它们可以有其在随机点的时间更改的程序集名称。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现中自定义方法控件。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method in a custom control. 运行此示例中所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分中的类概述。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]
